Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>There are some untrustworthy fellas rollin'
around the city right now.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>So if you're loaded up on ore, you should
probably sell it before you're scammed
out of it.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Wow, rude! I'd never rip you off!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well...<sp:5:0:0>I guess you DID almost get ripped
off.<sp:5:0:0> So your response is warranted.

<snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm not going to force you. If you decide
you'd like to sell it, then let me know.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Right now, I'm low on amber.


<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you sell me <clr:0000>a parcel of 10 pieces of
amber<clr:ffff>, I'll buy them for <clr:0000>a little more<clr:ffff> than
you could sell them for at other shops.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>You almost got duped there, huh?


Now that Death Mountain's eruptions
have stopped and the lava's cooled, I've
been seeing more Hylian travelers.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><clr:0000><snd:Sad_00><clr:ffff>Which is great, except those two have
been swindling travelers <sp:5:0:0>by offering to
take their ore for next to nothing.
After the <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>started
surfacing, everyone around here's been
acting strange.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>So be mindful of any <clr:0000>Gorons who've got
marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Shoot. We almost had him.


We coulda squeezed him for every measly
rupee he had.
Talk_06: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>We gotta let ya in on something.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>We'll squeeze the next one who rolls
along. But we got better things to do
at the moment.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>We're good Gorons.<sp:5:1:0> We'll take it off your
hands for a great price.

<snd:LaughL_00>How about...<clr:0000>three rupees<clr:ffff> for all your ore?
Whatever ore ya got! Come on, show us
the goods!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>My name is Ramella. I'm a jeweler from
Gerudo Town in the southwest of Hyrule.

The <clr:0000>ore<clr:ffff> that <clr:0000>YunoboCo <clr:ffff>deals in is high
quality, so I always come here to
replenish my stock.
If you're open to it, I'll gladly buy your ore
off of youâ€”for my shop.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>All right, then. I'm off to <clr:0000>Goron City <clr:ffff>to get
more gems.

Take care!
